PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , anthracene - based copolymers usually exhibit high crystallinity and high charge carrier mobility due to the coplanar fused structure of the anthracene unit.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Crystallinity: This is a property value that refers to the degree of crystallinity of the anthracene-based copolymers.
2. Charge carrier mobility: This is a property value that refers to the ability of the anthracene unit to transport charge carriers (such as electrons or holes) within the material.

So, the two property values that are mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Crystallinity
2. Charge carrier mobility
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Crystallinity
2. Charge carrier mobility

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph (such as "anthracene-based copolymers") are not directly related to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Crystallinity |
| Charge carrier mobility |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
